title: The Mill on the Floss - quoting Mrs. Tulliver

content.prompt: The effect of quoting Mrs. Tulliver's words in paragraph 2 is to

choices.label: represent her typically didactic manner of speaking
emphasize how simple her view of goodness is
illustrate her moral superiority to her husband and her daughter

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
